channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Line painting/bike lane needs redoing along Hall road, 29th August
item.description:
White line painting/bike lane needs redoing along lower part of Hall Road from the Arden Rd junction to Moorend Rd. Yellow lines also need repainting where the cars are parked. Causes obstruction and safety issues when cars turn onto hall road, especially during school drop offs
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 9, Hall Road, Leckhampton, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: General road markings, lines and stud issues

item.title: Bin not emptied & overflowing, 29th August
item.description:
Bin missed off weekly round despite it being the most used.....
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Hucclecote Road, Hucclecote, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: The advertising sign takes up half of the pavement and on occasion I have had to walk on the high street with cars turning right on to St James Rd., 29th August
item.description:
The advertising sign for salt daddy, a pop up food stall, is restricting and obstructing the use of pedestrians, mobility scooters and pushchairs with a walking toddler. It is left out permanently.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 39, High Street, Fairview, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Obstruction by unpermitted skip, scaffolding, building material on pavement
